1.content:
The heroes of Dragonball have run off to their umpteenth Tournament set up by some God or another for the purposes of fighting for something... and pretty much every Male from the Goku's posse decided to attend.

Goku, Vegeta, Piccolo, Tien, Krillin, Gohan, Trunks, hell even Master Roshi, Goten, and Android 17 decided to pick themselves up and attend. Really the only person who WASN'T invited... was Yamcha.

This happened for two reasons. Firstly; Nobody really respected Yamcha anymore. While he was strong among human standards, compared to most of the others in the crew he wasn't exactly up to par. Secondly; ... he had vanished. Goku was going to go search for his friend but then Beerus, Champa, Whis, and Vados all showed up and whisked him and all the other guys off to some extra-dimensional battleground for what would be, more or less, a massive tournament that encompassed pretty much EVERY universe. Hell, it would probably go on for a year or more.

But where was Yamcha? Well, Yamcha was off gathering the Dragonballs... and mere moments after the group were sent off he'd retrieved the last one.

Yamcha got all the Dragonballs set for wishing, setting them up on a deserted island... and he summoned Shenron.

The Dragon burst forth from the Dragonballs with glory and valor, prepared to grant a wish. He looked down at his summoner... and sighed.

"Oh... you." he hissed.

"Yeah. It's me Shenron! Here to make a wish" Yamcha replied cheerfully.

"...Which one am I bringing back this time?"

"Huh? Nobody! This wish is all for me! I want the power... to control Minds! Some kind of hypnosis technique!" he boomed, bursting with pride.

"Wait. Really?" Shenron asked, dumbfounded.

"Uh... yeah? Really. Why? Is that a problem?"

"No it's just... I don't think you people have ever summoned me to wish for something so... fun. Usually I'm bringing dead people back to life. Or Porunga is doing the same thing. Interesting... Your wish is granted." He said as his eyes shimmered momentarily.

"You have two more wishes. What do you seek?"

"Oh. Right. Two more huh? Uh... I can still do immortality, right? Let's do that and indestructibility."

Shenron looks at him for a moment, then lets out a hefty sigh.

"You intend to do something stupid with that hypnosis power, don't you..?" He asks. Yamcha simply shrugs impishly. Shenron sighs again and his eyes flash once more.

"Fine. There you go. Don't come crying to me when this goes poorly... though I'm certain you will. Farewell, human"

"Wait! How do I use the Hypnosis power?" He asked.

"You know that spirit ball thing you do? Do that. You'll see the change. Oh, and it won't work on myself of Porunga. I'm not stupid. Now goodbye!" With another flash of light, Shenron retreats back into the Dragonballs, which then blast apart, scattering across the globe.

"ALRIGHT!" Yamcha boomed happily, throwing his fist into the air and grinning like a nut-case. He held up his hand and made his Spirit Ball which was a bit... different. Instead of the usual Blue ball of energy, he now held what appeared to be pulsing spiraled ball.

"My dreams are coming true! Now all I have to do is wait for the guys to get dragged to another tournament and I can start getting... all those lovely BABES scattered around the Galaxy! All for Yamcha! I finally get to be the king!" he laughed.

And upon returning to the city... he learned that despite it not ACTUALLY being a wish, his wish came true. The guys were gone. And likely gone for a while! Not only that, but Vados stayed back on Earth to eat some scrumptious Earth delicacies. A luxury Whis did not get since Beerus wasn't going to let Whis stay when his own presence was required elsewhere. But Champa didn't have toe foresight to see that coming.


So, Yamcha was more or less alone with all the lovely ladies he could ever want. But he needed somewhere to start his reign.

So... who is he going to Hypnotize first?

11.content:
Yamcha knew who his first target would be. Android 18... or Lazuli. But let's be honest, it's Android 18.

Yamcha had always been jealous of Krillin for landing such an attractive woman. He wanted her.

Also... she had beat the crap out of him more than once. He felt like he could go for a bit of Hypnotic Revenge!


He made his way to her place of residence, and knocked on the door. There was a long silence but, soon enough, 18 opened. She saw him, crossed her arms, and sighed.

"Oh... you." she hissed. "Krillin's not here. He went to some tournament and took our damn daughter with him without even asking me. So if you're looking for him he isn't here. And when he gets back you'll wanna look for him at the nearest hospital."

"Oh... geez 18 I uh... I didn't know that. But uh actually I'm kinda here to see you." he said with a weak laugh. She looked at him in confusion.

"You're here to see me..? Alright. I'll humor this... weirdness. I'll assume this isn't going to waste my time. Get in here."

Yamcha quickly made his way into the house, and 18 slammed the door behind them.

"Alright. So what do you want?" she said, impatiently. Yamcha grinned and held up his hand. The Transformed Spirit Ball appeared in his grip. 18 looked at him in confusion.

"Okay... what the hell is that? Did you seriously come here just to show..... me......" she began, but trailed off as black and white spirals appeared in her eyes. Her mouth hung open and a small bit of drool began to form in the corner of her mouth.

"Holy hell! It actually worked!" he yelled in joy. He stopped his Hypnosis technique and looked at 18. He approached her and gave her a bit of a forceful poke. She swayed a moment before returning to her original stance, still hypnotized.

"HELL YES! Alright! Where do I go from here?!" he said, grinning ear to ear.

1122.content:
"Oh, I was just saying how it was nice of you to let me in." Yamcha said casually.

"Yeah whatever. So did you need something or...?" The blonde android replied, rolling her blue eyes in annoyance.

"I just wanted to ask if you think I should have been on the team for the tournament of power. After all, I am pretty damn strong."

"Is that really why you came all the way here? You're ridiculous, you aren't even as strong as my husband." Android 18 scoffed. "Now if you don't mind, I'm kind of busy, so can you just leave and let me go about my business?" She began to walk away.

"Aww, what's wrong? You don't want to be my personal cheerleader?" Yamcha smirked.

"What was that?!" 18 growled, turning around and glaring at Yamcha, clenching her fists. She grabbed him by the collar angrily. "If you weren't Krillin's friend I'd have half a mind to pound you into the dirt right here!"

"Jeez!" Yamcha replied, trying to pry 18's hands off his shirt. "I just thought that if I was in the tournament you might want to CHEER ME ON."

The unaware but furious android didn't let her grip relent even slightly.

"Cheering like some stupid airhead? Yeah right, not in a million years. Especially not for some weakling like y-" 18 stopped abruptly, eyes rolling up into her head for a moment. "Someone like... s-someone like youuu..." Her eyes were now looking at Yamcha, though now they appeared empty and blank.

"What was that you were saying?" Yamcha asked smugly.

18's grip on Yamcha's shirt didn't loosen. If anything, it tightened. She appeared to be struggling to reject her trigger, blinking rapidly and wobbling in place slightly, mouth slightly ajar allowing a bit more drool to fall out. Eventually the willful woman gave out, opening her blank blue eyes for the last time and staring adoringly at Yamcha and finally letting go of his shirt.

Yamcha was impressed with how strong the cyborg's will had been, but not particularly surprised. This was the woman who completely rejected Doctor Gero's conditioning after all.

"I was saying how I would love to cheer for you!" 18 sang out in a bubbly voice, so unlike her usual demeanor. She was now clearly the type of airhead she was just insulting a minute ago.

"Great! Why don't you give me a sexy cheer then?"

"Yes sir!" 18 said in a breathy tone that Yamcha found quite sexy. She absentmindedly brushed some stray strands of blonde hair out of her eyes, before letting them fall back to cover them once again. As she did this she gave Yamcha the most adorable little smile he had ever seen. Was this really the same 18?

"2, 4, 6, 8, who do we appreciate?! Yamcha!" 18 suddenly cheered, jumping up and down pumping her fists. She made sure to stick her chest out so Yamcha could appreciate her large boobs bouncing under her shirt. After all, he did ask her to cheer sexily!

Yamcha stared at the show mouth agape. Sure, this wasn't the most original cheer out there, but it made sense that 18 wouldn't know a lot of cheer routines. She just wasn't that type of lady. Well, at least she didn't used to be. He closed his mouth as 18 finished. She gave him a wink, cute and peppy grin covering her face.

"Did I do good Yamcha?" 18 asked excitedly. 18 was never this excited.

"That was... incredible!"

"Yaaaaay!" 18 cheered once again, jumping in the air like she was a schoolgirl. Oh man if only she could see herself...

This gave Yamcha an idea. Was it..?

Yamcha's choice was obvious. Bulma. The girl he technically USED to date, but she ended up with Vegeta instead. He was NOT a fan of that, but he knew that up until now he could do nothing about it. Firstly because Bulma would never get back with him under normal circumstances, and secondly because Vegeta would have blown him up.

But Vegeta wasn't here. Even if he was, Yamcha technically made himself Vegeta-proof. So with that he made his way to Capsule Corp.

He made his way inside with no issue since... people can more or less just come and go from Capsule corp as they please. Yamcha had always found that to be a bit weird, but he wasn't going to complain.

As he entered the main lab, he found Bulma.

"He-ey! Bulma!" he said gleefully.

"Huh? Oh. Yamcha?" she said.

"Yeah! It's me! I was just in the neighborhood and--" he stopped as Bulma gave him a slap across the face.

"Where have you been?! What happened to 'Oh don't worry Bulma! I'm not busy! I can go get those new components for you'?!"

"Oh right... I uh... I was supposed to do that. But don't worry! I have them!"

He reached towards his pocket, activates his hypnosis technique, and whips his hand back around. Bulma looks at it in anger.

"Yamcha. What the hell is this? If this is supposed to be a joke it isn't funny. This is just some... glowing... spiral...?" she said, trailing off and almost trying to study the technique before spirals appeared in her eyes and seemed to sap away her mind. She stood there, looking at the ball blankly. Yamcha grinned triumphantly and stopped the technique.

"Finally! I got your attitude under control! ...Well... and also the rest of you. But damn it's nice to have you finally shut up and stop criticizing everyone. Anyways. You're gonna do whatever I tell you from now on. Got it?" he commanded. She just nodded at him in reply.

"Good! In that case... Let me think of something for you to do, miss Bossy."

What does he make her do?

121.content:
Yamcha knew exactly what he wanted to do, he knew as soon as he decided Bulma was his first target. They were an item once and even if it isn’t going to be real he wants to recapture that old flame or rather create his own little spark.

“Ok Bulma listen to me and listen well. I’m in control of your mind, your feelings, your memories, their are some things in that head of yours that must be corrected. I and I alone will rectify these mistakes. Got it?” Yamahas says as he plays with the orb in front of Bulma’s face. Her eyes glued to it as it dances in front of.

“Yes Yamcha, you are the master of my mind, please fix it.” Bulma was compelled to say. Completely unable to fight this power over her.

“Good now remember back to the good old days. Before Trunks, Vegeta, or saiyans. Do you remember when we were in love with each other.” Yamahas grins as he remembers the good old times.

“I- ummm- I hmmm- Uhhhh- I’m sorry I don’t remember ever being in love with Yamcha.” Bulma says in a monotone but clearly sincere voice.

“Gah” It feels like a dagger was plunged into his heart.

“Wh-What do you mean of course we were!” He objects.

“Nah, I don’t think we were.” A bit of a Bulma’s sharp wit shows up as she crosses her arms as she can’t imagine a time where the two were in “love”

“W-well I’m telling you now we were, think back closely. You now remember it clear as day now. We were madly in love with one another. Remember?”

The power of the orb once again overpowered Bulma’s mind and her resistance was quickly extinguished.

“Yes, I remember now, we were in love, my first love Yamcha...” She confirms while going back to a neutral pose.

“Good Bulma, That’s it remember, you and I were and continue to be madly in love.”

“Yes I...wait no, you died to Vegeta, Actually not even Vegeta but to his Saibamen. You sort of became... undesirable after that.” Letting reality slip in again Bulma scratches her head at the suggestion the pair of them are still in fact in love. It’s growing clear to Yamaha that completely controlling Bulma isn’t as easy as he thought.

“Undesirable?! What do you mean?!”

“Well you sorta became kind of useless in the group. No offense but it’s not like I could rely on you for anything.”

“Well guess what you are remembering it wrong! You can rely on me! After all think about all the times I saved your life.”

“W-What Tim-“ Bulma’s mind is pulled back into the power of the orb. Her memories are being rewritten and she now remembers Yamcha bravely protecting her in her time of need.

“That’s it you remember now don’t you? How I protected you? Your amazing handsome boyfriend? Your heart racing as I carried you in my big strong arms?”

The flashes of memories filled Bulma’s head. Overwhelming her with a sense of love and admiration towards Yamaha she never had.

“Oh Yamcha, you are so incredible. I don’t know what I would have done without you.” She places her hand over her heart as it’s set a flutter towards her new hero.

“Now you are getting it babe. I was always their for you. You know why you and I are a couple and we are madly MADLY in love.”

“B-But Vegeta and Trunks...” a hint of resistance pops up once again.

“No no no just forget about them for now. From now in Vegeta is just a angry guy and Trunks is just some kid from the future. All that matters is us and our love. You love me Bulma. You are my girlfriend. This is all that matters to you.” Yamcha increases the power of his orb making sure he can keep Bulma in trance for good.

Though hesitant at first the power of the hypnosis orb is too great and hearing these comforting words from the man she loves is enough to tear down any barriers in her mind.

“Yes Yamcha, I am your loving girlfriend. I love you with all my heart.” She says much to Yamcha’s pleasure.

“Focus on that babe, how much you love me, feel it grow every second you think of me, stronger and more passionate. You love me SO much that you can’t help to be submissive and become my obedient little girlfriend. Loving and pleasing me is the greatest pleasure you can receive? Right my little Bulma?”

“Of course, I love you so much Yamcha. I’ll do whatever you say as long as it makes you happy.” Bulma affirms in her trance.

“Very good, Now when I snap my finger you will awaken as my loving obedient, loyal, girlfriend. All the memories I gave you are more real than anything else in your mind, you are 1000% convinced you are little more than my perfect girlfriend. Understand,”

Bulma gives one final nod as she accepts this reality in her mind.

“Then without further ado, wake up in 1-2-3...”

*SNAP*

Immediately Bulma’s body language shifts from the stiff neutral stance to a more flirtatious one. Her eyes which were blankly focused on the orb itself now shift and are glued on Yamcha, their gaze filled with lust and desire. She sensually struts up to him, he nervously gulps as she wraps her arms around him.

“Hey big boy, You came to surprise your girlfriend? I must admit it means the world to have you here with me. I don’t know why but it feels like forever since we’ve been together.” She lovingly presses herself up against him. Giving him a passionate kiss before pulling away slowly.

“Y-you have no idea.” Yam has replied both in shock at what’s happening and pleasure in it as well.

“So Sexy it’s you and me alone in the house for a bit? What would you like to do? I’m so eager to hear what you have planned for us.”

“Oh don’t you worry babe I got something very fun in mind...”

Bulma gives another nod.

“Good, So then when I snap- no actually let’s keep this to theme. I’m adding an imaginary On/Off switch on your body. Located on your uh...belly Button. Whenever I press it it’ll switch you from on to off and vice versa. While you are off you’ll be completely inanimate until I turn you on again or command you with hypnosis to awaken.”

He walks up to Bulma and lifts up her shirt carefully to get a good shot of her belly button. He giggles excitedly at the thought of his new robot.

“Ok I’m going to press it. When you do you’ll turn on as my new robot. Ready? 1-2-3 GO!” He pokes her belly button and as soon as she does Bulma’s eyes roll to the back of her head as her upper body goes limp. her head and shoulders slump forward and she is completely silent.

A few seconds go by.

“Um Bulma? R-Robot? You O-Ok?”

No response. Yamaha starts to sweat nervously.

“Oh no d-did I break her brain! V-Vegeta is going to kill me! Come on turn on!” He starts picking her belly button over and over again to try and get a response.

Display Mode: I’ll mindlessly pose and show off my body as you see fit. I’ll be in any state of dress or undress you’d prefer

Obviously if master has more ideas of how he can control and use me just enter me in Robot mode and you can add additional modes, triggers, or whatever you think will be best to please you.
